mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applications (user_id, level, sp_product, message) VALUES (#{user_id},#{level}, #{sp_product}, #{message})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.application_id, a.created_at, a.sp_product, a.message, a.status, a.level, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.phone_number
FROM applications a LEFT JOIN user_info u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.status != '처리완료' OR a.status IS NULL OR a.status = '' ORDER BY a.created_at DESC;
